'''Sara Brown''' is a Tolkien scholar and Language & Literature Department Chair at [[Signum University]]. She has a PhD from Salford University with a thesis entitled ''From Abjection to Alchemy in J.R.R. Tolkien’s Middle-earth Legendarium''.

She also co-hosts [[The Tolkien Experience]] and [[The Rings of Power Wrap-up]] podcasts and serves on the editorial board of [[Mallorn (journal)]].

==Awards==
* [[2023]]: '''[[Tolkien Society Awards|Tolkien Society Award]]: Best Article''', "'All that glisters is not gold': The Ring of Power and the Deception of Simile" in [[Mallorn 63]]
* [[2024]]: '''[[Tolkien Society Awards|Tolkien Society Award]]: Best Article''', "'The Tale of ‘Aldarion and Erendis': Not Just a Medieval Love Story" in [[Journal of Tolkien Research]] vol. 18 no. 1
